pages.text:
We Throw Killer Parties
All-Inclusive Group Packages
Private Dining Room
Semi-Private & Private Events
VIP Reserved Tables & More
Whether you’re planning a big night out or need a venue to host a meeting, Copper Blues is a dynamic all-purpose restaurant & entertainment venue. No event is too big or too small. We offer fully customizable food & beverage packages, floor plans & a state-of-the-art audio / visual system. For more information, please complete the form and one of our event planners will get back to you, ASAP.
Contact Our Events Team

Copper Club
The Copper Club is a membership only program that gives you early access to our upcoming events. You’ll also be invited to some special “Members Only” experiences built around live entertainment, food, and drinks

Music
Copper Blues features the best live music 7 nights a week with acoustic acts for happy hour and killer bands on the weekends! Come see the best cover bands without a cover charge and don’t miss other special events with DJs, tribute bands and more!
